attributes.action: A vote of NO confidence in the current Government
attributes.additional_details:
As benefits are minimized to below the rate of inflation, childcare is being watered down, council tax rising, bedroom tax introduced, childrens centres closed, higher education made even more expensive and now there will be no married persons tax breaks. It would seem that this government desperately want to break down the family unit.

Join me in signing this petition to be taken to the Legislature of our great nation to force the current Government to resign.

rejection.details: Votes of no confidence are a matter for Parliament not the Government.
